amendment.description: Amendment narrows definitions in the bill regarding what information may be identified, obtained, and shared.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 13 printed in House Report 112-454 to narrow definitions in the bill regarding what information may be identified, obtained, and shared.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Goodlatte amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 414 - 1 (Roll no. 189).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Goodlatte amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 414 - 1 (Roll no. 189).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Goodlatte.
